```{r setup}
library(alohaal)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Make a subset for cutthroat trout:
cutthroat <- alohaal::and_vertebrates %>%
filter(SPECIES == "ONCL")

# Create a scatter plot of length versus weight:
ggplot(data = cutthroat, aes(x = LENGTH1, y = WEIGHT)) +
 		 geom_point()

```
